original_title: 30 años de La Pachanga: Vilma Palma e Vampiros
overview: In the early 90s, born in Rosario, Argentina, Vilma Palma e Vampiros; a band that would revolutionize Latin American 'pop' with one of his first songs,  which immediately became an impressive hit, La Pachanga.
title: 30 Years of La Pachanga: Vilma Palma and Vampires
